thread.section_title: Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Strange area but overall positive experience
thread.title_full: Strange area but overall positive experience - Review of Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: zamy2016
title: Strange area but overall positive experience
text: Nice cosy hotel which has everything you require and a beautiful artistic theme. The staff are very helpful and the breakfast is good too. The only thing I would say is the location is central in terms of getting to places but is located in a narrow and strange alleyway. It's not a touristic area which I guess can be a good thing. The Subway is a ten minute walk away. They also have shadow art performances free for guests three nights a week. Good value for money I would say.
